Yes No Description of Property Value of Property Drug Activity Drug Type Amount / Unit Counts Domestic Statute Violation Number Warrant / Capias Number Violation of ORD # Drug Description Possession of MARIJUANA M UNK 20 Grams 05/1263 81951113 1168 Drug Activity Drug Type Amount / Unit Counts Domestic Statute Violation Number Warrant / Capias Number Violation of ORD # Drug Description Drug Paraphernalia - Possession 1 pic. 05/1263 81751147111 Drug Activity Drug Type Amount / Unit Counts Domestic Statute Violation Number Warrant / Capias Number Violation of ORD # Charge Description Offense # Bond Charge Description Offense # Bond SEP 15 2005 Instruction No. 1 Mandatory Appearance in Court Instruction No. 2 You need not appear in Court but must comply with instructions on Reverse Side I AGREE TO APPEAR AT THE TIME AND PLACE DESIGNATED TO ANSWER THE OFFENSE CHARGED OR TO PAY THE FINE SUBSCRIBED. I UNDERSTAND THAT IF I FULLY FAIL TO APPEAR BEFORE THE COURT AT THE TIME DESIGNATED TO APPEAR THAT MAY BE HELD IN CONTEMPT OF COURT AND AN ARREST WARRANT MAY BE ISSUED. 3228 Gun Club Road West Palm Beach, FL. additional_notes: The document is a Juvenile Referral Report from the Palm Beach Police Department. It contains handwritten information about the arrest, charges, and court appearance. The document is dated September 11, 2005, and the court date is set for September 27, 2005.
